info.title: Video Metadata & Transcript API Reference
info.description: REST APIs for retrieving video metadata and transcripts from YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter

channel.description: The channel name. Supported values: apify, rapid, memories.ai

code.description: Response code indicating the result status

msg.description: Response message describing the operation result

title.example: Close Encounter with a Siamese Crocodile | Saving Planet Earth: Crocodiles | BBC Earth

downloadable_video_link.description: Direct download link for video file

downloadable_audio_link.description: Direct download link for audio file

merged_downloadable_link.description: Merged video and audio download link

description.example: Radio DJ Edith Bowman has a close encounter with a young crocodile...

additional_metadata.description: Additional metadata including format details, keywords, channel information, etc.

example: Close encounter with a Siamese Crocodile

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful

channel.description: The channel name. Supported values: apify, rapid, memories.ai

code.description: Response code indicating the result status

msg.description: Response message describing the operation result

start.description: Start time of the transcript segment in seconds

dur.description: Duration of the transcript segment in seconds

text.example: they've intercepted a croc from the
text.description: The transcript text for this segment

data.description: Response data object containing Instagram metadata

200.description: Video transcript with detailed timing information and metadata

code.description: Response code indicating the result status

msg.description: Response message describing the operation result

transcript.example: I'm gonna get a little personal. I had gastric bypass 10 years ago...

text.example: I'm gonna get a little personal.

start.description: Start time of the segment in seconds

end.description: End time of the segment in seconds

segments.description: Array of transcript segments with timing information

start.description: Start time of the word in seconds

end.description: End time of the word in seconds

words.description: Array of individual words with timing information

caption.example: I have the moves that they're looking for.

usesOriginalAudio.description: Whether the video uses original audio

channel.description: The channel name. Supported values: apify, rapid, memories.ai

200.description: Video metadata information with detailed Twitter/X data

code.description: Response code indicating the result status

msg.description: Response message describing the operation result

text.example: France's Kevin Aymoz couldn't believe his 159.97 free skate score that led to his first-ever ISU Grand Prix GOLD.  https://t.co/901FxyK1Jc

fullText.example: France's Kevin Aymoz couldn't believe his 159.97 free skate score that led to his first-ever ISU Grand Prix GOLD.  https://t.co/901FxyK1Jc

isReply.description: Whether the tweet is a reply

possiblySensitive.description: Whether the content is possibly sensitive

isBlueVerified.description: Whether the author has blue verification

description.example: The official home of NBC's coverage of the Olympics and Paralympics.

variants.description: Array of video variants with different bitrates

isRetweet.description: Whether the tweet is a retweet

isQuote.description: Whether the tweet is a quote

data.description: Array containing Twitter/X tweet metadata objects

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful

channel.description: The channel name. Supported values: apify, rapid, memories.ai

200.description: Video transcript in multiple formats (plain text and WEBVTT)

code.description: Response code indicating the result status

msg.description: Response message describing the operation result

transcript_text.example: >> 159.97 SO HE GOES. INTO THE LEAD AND THIS PLAY. LEAD AND THIS PLAY. >> HIS REACTION. >> HIS REACTION. >> YES. >> YES. >> FIRST PLACE ARE.
transcript_text.description: Plain text transcript without timing information

json_text.description: JSON format transcript (may be empty array)

webvtt_text.example:
WEBVTT

00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:05.696
>> 159.97 SO HE GOES. INTO THE 
LEAD AND THIS PLAY.

00:00:05.707 --> 00:00:07.974
LEAD AND THIS PLAY. 
>> HIS REACTION.
webvtt_text.description: Transcript in WEBVTT format with timing information
